original_text:
This is the passage of Scripture the eunuch was reading:
“He was led like a sheep to the slaughter,
    and as a lamb before its shearer is silent,
    so he did not open his mouth.
korean_text: 읽는 성경 구절은 이것이니 일렀으되 그가 도살자에게로 가는 양과 같이 끌려갔고 털 깎는 자 앞에 있는 어린 양이 조용함과 같이 그의 입을 열지 아니하였도다

sentences.original_text: This is the passage of Scripture
He was led like a sheep
as a lamb before its shearer
sentences.korean_translation: 털 깎는 자 앞의 어린 양처럼

sentences.original_text: so he did not open his mouth
